articles.description: Darwin Nunez comes off the bench to score a dramatic 99th-minute winner and send Liverpool four points clear at the top of the Premier League.
articles.title: Nunez scores 99th-minute winner as Liverpool beat Forest

articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen sends out a chilling message to his Formula 1 rivals with a crushing victory in the season-opening Bahrain Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Bahrain Grand Prix: Max Verstappen takes dominant win for Red Bull

articles.description: Jude Bellingham is sent off for complaining after the final whistle denies him a winning goal for Real Madrid in a dramatic game at Valencia.
articles.title: Bellingham sent off after full-time in Real draw
Ratcliffe praise of Man City an honour - Guardiola

articles.description: Great Britain's Josh Kerr and Molly Caudery win stunning golds in front of an electric home crowd at the World Athletics Indoor Championships in Glasgow.
articles.title: World Athletics Indoor Championships 2024: Josh Kerr and Molly Caudery win gold medals for Great Britain

articles.description: Nottingham Forest referee analyst Mark Clattenburg bemoans decision in the build-up to Liverpool's winner on Saturday.
articles.title: Forest's Clattenburg bemoans officiating in Liverpool loss

articles.description: Liverpool dug deep to find a late winner at Nottingham Forest and the evidence shows they will fight to the end in the Premier League title race.
articles.title: 'It's never over' - Liverpool will fight to the end

articles.description: What does Rangers' surprise defeat by Motherwell say about the Ibrox side's title chances and visitors' top-six hopes?
articles.title: 'Phenomenal' Motherwell win a 'huge blow' to Rangers title bid

articles.description: Tottenham boost their hopes of qualifying for the Champions League by staging a dramatic late comeback to beat Crystal Palace.
articles.title: Spurs stage late comeback to beat Palace

articles.description: Aston Villa's Ollie Watkins is dreaming of a Euro 2024 place after moving on to a career-best 16 Premier League goals this season.
articles.title: 'He's on the plane' - Watkins dreaming of Euros
